name: Wave Rider (itch)
description:
Reach the goal using the different waves-beacons to push the shell nut!

Jam Site: GranadaJam

Diversifiers: Chipping In:The game uses only 8 bit style audio, only 8 bit style visuals, or both.

Installation Instructions:

You needn't install it, you must execute the file '.exe' , select '1280x700' resolution and enjoy the videogame! =D

Credits:

Esteban Albarral Pérez (Music & FX)

Manuel Rollán Miñarro (Animation)

Nacho Medina Castillo (Programmer)

Pablo Fernández Guerra (Programmer)

Sara Cuéllar Romero (Graphics Design)
